statements: SELECT * FROM WindFarms;
SELECT location_name, wind_speed FROM WindFarms;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT * FROM WindFarms ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM WindFarms WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY location_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM WindFarms WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM WindFarms WHERE wind_speed BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY location_name
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM WindFarms WHERE location_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude, wind_speed FROM WindFarms WHERE latitude < 45 AND longitude > -90 AND wind_speed > 15 ORDER BY wind_speed DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_locations;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM wind_farm_locations;
SELECT location_id, wind_speed FROM wind_farm_locations WHERE wind_speed > 10.00;
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_performance ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT performance_id, power_generated FROM wind_farm_performance WHERE power_generated >= 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_locations
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM wind_farm_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC
SELECT AVG(wind_speed) AS average_speed FROM wind_farm_locations
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, wind_speed FROM wind_farm_locations WHERE wind_speed > 10
SELECT * FROM wind_farm_performance WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY power_generated DESC
SELECT * FROM WindFarmLocations;
SELECT location_id, average_wind_speed, longitude, latitude FROM WindFarmLocations;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT brand, height, rotor_diameter FROM WindTurbines WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT production_id, production_amount, production_date FROM WindProduction WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, average_wind_speed FROM WindFarmLocations;
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT production_date, production_amount FROM WindProduction WHERE production_amount > 500 ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT w.turbine_id, w.brand, p.production_date, p.production_amount FROM WindTurbines w INNER JOIN WindProduction p ON w.turbine_id = p.turbine_id WHERE p.production_amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.production_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM WindFarmLocations l INNER JOIN WindTurbines t ON l.location_id = t.location_id INNER JOIN WindProduction p ON t.turbine_id = p.turbine_id WHERE p.production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, elevation FROM locations WHERE elevation > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wind_speed ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT location_id, direction FROM wind_direction WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wind_speed ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE elevation > 500;
SELECT location_id, direction FROM wind_direction WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(power_output) AS avg_power_output FROM wind_power;
SELECT * FROM WindFarms;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM Locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT id, model, height FROM Turbines WHERE capacity > 5;
SELECT name, longitude, latitude FROM WindFarms ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT location_id, MAX(speed) FROM WindSpeed GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT id, name, latitude, longitude FROM WindFarms;
SELECT * FROM Turbines WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT id, model, height FROM Turbines ORDER BY height DESC;
SELECT l.name AS Location, w.speed AS Wind_Speed FROM Locations l JOIN WindSpeed w ON l.id = w.location_id;
SELECT a.id, a.location_id, a.speed, a.capacity FROM Analysis a JOIN Locations l ON a.location_id = l.id WHERE l.name = 'California';
